articles.title: San Antonio Spurs' Keldon Johnson agrees to 4-year, $80M extension
articles.description: The San Antonio Spurs and forward Keldon Johnson reached agreement on a four-year extension worth $80 million on Friday night.
articles.content:
The San Antonio Spurs and forward Keldon Johnson have agreed to a four-year, $80 million extension, his representative Klutch Sports Agency announced Friday night.

articles.title: Longtime Russell Westbrook agent Thad Foucher parting ways with Lakers star over 'irreconcilable differences'
articles.description: Thad Foucher suggested that he and Russell Westbrook were no longer fully aligned over whether the former MVP should want to remain on the Lakers.
articles.content:
Los Angeles Lakers star Russell Westbrook and his longtime agent, Thad Foucher of Wasserman, have parted ways, Foucher told ESPN on Friday night.

articles.title: Allyson Felix caps final appearance at track world championships with bronze medal in 4x400m mixed relay
articles.description: Allyson Felix won her 19th and final medal in the world championships Friday night -- a bronze she took after running the second leg of America's 4x400-meters in the mixed relay that's been touted as the last major race of the 36-year-old's career.

articles.title: Sources -- MLB, MLBPA remain about $80M apart on international draft money
articles.description: MLB's latest counterproposal allocated $181 million in guaranteed spending for the top 600 international players in an inaugural 2024 draft, roughly an $80 million difference from what the MLBPA submitted last week, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: MLB to pay $185 million in settlement with minor league players over minimum-wage and overtime violations
articles.description: MLB will pay $185 million to settle the federal class-action lawsuit filed by minor league players who sought pay for minimum-wage and overtime violations.

articles.title: Miami Dolphins' Jason McCourty retires after 13 NFL seasons
articles.description: Jason McCourty, who played for the winless Browns in 2017 and then won a Super Bowl with the Patriots the following season alongside his twin brother, Devin, has retired after a 13-year career that also included stops with the Titans and Dolphins.
articles.content:
Veteran cornerback Jason McCourty announced his retirement from the NFL on Friday, marking the end of a 13-season career for the former sixth-round draft pick.

articles.title: Derek Jeter on his future in baseball after Miami Marlins exit - 'At some point, I'm sure I'll do something'
articles.description: Nearly five months after stepping down as CEO of the Marlins, Derek Jeter said in an interview with ESPN that he can still see himself staying involved with the sport of baseball.
articles.content:
Nearly five months after stepping down as CEO of the Miami Marlins, Derek Jeter indicated he would be open to a return to the sport in some capacity.
